author: Staff Reporter
text:
Thirty members of Makkal Nala Kootani staged a demonstration in front of the Tasmac outlet opposite the ESI Hospital on Kamaraj Road on Wednesday seeking permanent closure of the shop.

They said that the shop was closed for a day on Tuesday when the Prime Minister came there for inaugurating a building in that hospital.

Talks held

The Coimbatore South Tahsildar conducted talks with them and assured them of necessary action.
title: Protest to close Tasmac outlet
